gen:link.msg:message: Instant facts BEHOREN te worden gerapporteerd met instant {$FinancialReportingPeriodPrePreviousEndDateParam}, {$FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousEndDateParam}, {$FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDateParam}, {$FinancialReportingPeriodFirstPeriodEndDateParam}, {$FinancialReportingPeriodSecondPeriodEndDateParam}, {$FinancialReportingPeriodThirdPeriodEndDateParam}, {$FinancialReportingPeriodFourthPeriodEndDateParam} of {$FinancialReportingPeriodFifthPeriodEndDateParam} en duration facts BEHOREN te worden gerapporteerd met startDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousStartDateParam} en endDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousEndDateParam}, startDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodFirstPeriodStartDateParam} en endDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodFirstPeriodEndDateParam}, startDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodSecondPeriodStartDateParam} en endDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodSecondPeriodEndDateParam}, startDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodThirdPeriodStartDateParam} en endDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodThirdPeriodEndDateParam}, startDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodFourthPeriodStartDateParam} en endDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodFourthPeriodEndDateParam} of startDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodFifthPeriodStartDateParam} en endDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodFifthPeriodEndDateParam}. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationHousing_AllPeriodAspectCondParamPPEtFifPE1_AllItems')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationHousing_AllPeriodAspectCondParamPPEtFifPE1_AllItems return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
